welcome_message_body: Welcome to Fountain Inn, where southern charm meets modern amenities. Known for its quaint downtown and friendly community, we invite you to explore our city and all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Donaldson Center Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Donaldson Center Airport handles all cargo and freight operations for the airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greenville Spartanburg International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is the primary hub for domestic flights at Greenville Spartanburg International Airport.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B primarily serves international flights at Greenville Spartanburg International Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greenville Downtown Airport offers a variety of services for travelers including check-in, baggage claim, and dining options.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Greenville Downtown Airport caters to private and corporate aircraft, offering exclusive amenities and services for a luxurious travel experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Spartanburg Downtown Memorial Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Spartanburg Downtown Memorial Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'SPA Free WiFi' on their device.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greenwood Airport houses all check-in counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Greenwood Airport serves private and charter flights, with a separate entrance and amenities for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
